channel.title: Projects on The Ocean Code
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on The Ocean Code

item.title: FjordLight
item.description: A methodology, dataset, and accompanying R package to quantify the light environment within the waters of Arctic fjords.

item.title: Demo for the MHW definition
item.description: An interactive application that allows the user to explore the components of the MHW definition.

item.title: Marine heatwave tracker
item.description: A daily updating web application for tracking the occurrence of marine heatwaves around the globe.
